name: Harassment Detection
desc: An interactive browser-based demo for real-time detection of Bengali cyberbullying & harassment using concepts from mBERT, XAI.

name: NID System
desc: This project is a demo web application for Network Intrusion Detection using a Random Forest classifier.

name: Flood Resilience Dashboard
desc: Computing Flood Resilience Index (FRI), predicting crop yield, and exploring scenario analysis at the division level with SHAP.
